 017: #cpdef cardinal_spline(Points points, int num_of_seg=5, float tension=0.5, bint close=True):
 018: #    # Duplicate the array
 019: #    pts: Points = [x for x in points]
 020: #
 021: #    l = points.length
 022: #    r_pos = 0
 023: #    r_len = (l-1) * num_of_seg + 1 + (num_of_seg if close else 0)
 024: #    cache = [0 for _ in range((num_of_seg + 2) * 4)]
 025: #    cache_ptr = 4
 026: #
 027: #    res: Points = [None] * r_len
 028: #
 029: #    if close:
 030: #        pts.unshift(points[l - 1])  # insert end point as first point
 031: #        pts.push(points[0])  # first point as last point
 032: #    else:
 033: #        pts.unshift(points[0])  # copy 1. point and insert at beginning
 034: #        pts.push(points[l - 1])  # duplicate end-points
 035: #
 036: #    # cache inner-loop calculations as they are based on t alone
 037: #    cache[0] = 1                                # 1,0,0,0
 038: #
 039: #    for i in range(1, num_of_seg):
 040: #        st = i / num_of_seg
 041: #        st2 = st * st
 042: #        st3 = st2 * st
 043: #        st23 = st3 * 2
 044: #        st32 = st2 * 3
 045: #
 046: #        cache[cache_ptr] = st23 - st32 + 1    # c1
 047: #        cache[cache_ptr+1] = st32 - st23        # c2
 048: #        cache[cache_ptr+2] = st3 - 2 * st2 + st    # c3
 049: #        cache[cache_ptr+3] = st3 - st2            # c4
 050: #        cache_ptr += 4
 051: #
 052: #    cache[++cache_ptr] = 1                        # 0,1,0,0
 053: #
 054: #    def parse(Points pts, list[float] cache, int l):
 055: #        for i in range(1, l):
 056: #            pt1 = pts[i].x
 057: #            pt2 = pts[i].y
 058: #            pt3 = pts[i+1].x
 059: #            pt4 = pts[i+1].y
 060: #
 061: #            t1x = (pt3 - pts[i-1].x) * tension
 062: #            t1y = (pt4 - pts[i-1].y) * tension
 063: #            t2x = (pts[i+2].x - pt1) * tension
 064: #            t2y = (pts[i+2].y - pt2) * tension
 065: #
 066: #            for t in range(num_of_seg):
 067: #                c = t << 2 #t * 4
 068: #                c1 = cache[c]
 069: #                c2 = cache[c+1]
 070: #                c3 = cache[c+2]
 071: #                c4 = cache[c+3]
 072: #
 073: #                res[r_pos] = (
 074: #                    c1 * pt1 + c2 * pt3 + c3 * t1x + c4 * t2x,
 075: #                    c1 * pt2 + c2 * pt4 + c3 * t1y + c4 * t2y
 076: #                )
 077: #                r_pos += 1
 078: #
 079: #    # calc. points
 080: #    parse(pts, cache, l)
 081: #
 082: #    if close:
 083: #        # l = points.length
 084: #        pts = []
 085: #        pts.push(points[l - 2], points[l - 1])  # second last and last
 086: #        pts.push(points[0], points[1])  # first and second
 087: #        parse(pts, cache, 2)
 088: #
 089: #    # add last point
 090: #    l = 0 if close else points.length - 1
 091: #    res[r_pos] = points[l]
 092: #
 093: #    return res
